p: Previous investigations of dissolved organics in hydrothermal fluid in Kamchatka concerned volatile compounds [ 11] and nonvolatile amino acids [ 12]. However, a large group of moderately volatile organic compounds was virtually unexplored in 2005 when we obtained access to a Shimadzu GCMS-QP2010S spectrometer. The field sites in 11 hydrothermal systems in Kamchatka were sampled and analyzed, and the results were separated into two groups:
